body:
<FB238F89-BF3F-4457-B41D-3CC5FF42359C@gmail.com>

Thanks - it was a display problem. I should have known that if there appears to be a problem with Radiance, check the hardware first, then the OS, last Radiance :)

Martin

Hi Martin,

It looks to me like your JPEG is corrupted.  What happens if you
regenerate it, or write it out from Photosphere?

-Greg
